= Procedure =

This needs to be updated with more details.


*Usage of Ubuntu 8.10 is presupposed*

`apt-get install subversion` to be able to check out code

=== Vala ===
  * Download and unpack latest version at http://live.gnome.org/Vala/Release
  * apt-get install flex bison libglib2.0-dev
  * ./configure && make install
  * ldconfig -v

=== libspotify ===
  * Download and unpack latest version at http://developer.spotify.com/en/libspotify/overview/
  * make install
  * ldconfig -v
